name: bracket-matcher
description: Highlight the matching bracket for the `(){}[]` character under the cursor. Move the cursor to the matching bracket with `ctrl-m`.

autocompleteCharacters.description: Autocompleted characters treated as matching pairs, such as `()`, and `{}`.

pairsWithExtraNewline.description: Automatically add a newline between the pair when enter is pressed.

autocompleteBrackets.description: Autocomplete bracket and quote characters, such as `(` and `)`, and `"`.

wrapSelectionsInBrackets.description: Wrap selected text in brackets or quotes when the editor contains selections and the opening bracket or quote is typed.

highlightMatchingLineNumber.description: Highlight the line number of the matching bracket.

alwaysSkipClosingPairs.description: Always skip closing pairs in front of the cursor.
